cast.name: 萨拉·克利莫斯卡 Sara Klimoska
米洛斯·比柯维奇 Milos Bikovic

writer.name: 戈兰·拉多万诺维奇 Goran Radovanović

director.name: 戈兰·拉多万诺维奇 Goran Radovanović

introduction: Eight-year-old Sava, his mother and one-year-old brother live in a Belgrade skyscraper. His father is absent, he works on a cargo ship. This relatively normal life is disrupted by the beginning of the bombing of Serbia. The air attacks begin in a general atmosphere of tension, disbelief and despair. Sava’s behavior changes. His school is closed down, a shelter becomes another home, and the girl Milica, the daughter of the local priest he is in love with, leaves the country with her mother and sisters.
